programme.title: First Love
programme.desc: Left alone at the age of 17, Woo-min, enters into cruel world to protect his late father’s caregiver, Su-jung.

programme.title: The Huntresses
programme.desc: Joseon's best bounty hunter, Jin-ok, takes on a high-reward case, unaware it points to her father's killer.

programme.title: The Table (MINARI'S YE-RI HAN)
programme.desc: At the same table in the café, 4 pairs of people talked, their stories saturated with dream, hope, and fear.

programme.title: Lovers' Concerto
programme.desc: Ji-hwan, a college student, befriends two cute girls his age. Over the years, he loses contact with them and learns a surprising secret about the two.

programme.title: Little Forest
programme.desc: A young woman grows tired of life in the city and returns to her hometown in the countryside.

programme.title: The Battle: Roar to Victory
programme.desc: Over a 4 day period, a fierce battle takes place between Korean independence militias and imperialist Japanese forces in Manchuria, China.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il, who is a five-month pregnant ahead of her marriage, goes to her hometown to find her biological father, whom she has never seen since the age of seven. After returning to Seoul, To-il’s mom, stepdad and biological father join forces to find the groom-to-be who has been missing on the day of the meeting with bride-groom families.

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: Former couple goes tit for tat after a bitter break up, going into a deeper spiral of love and hate.

programme.title: One-Line
programme.desc: A young hustler joins a group of professional con artists to begin a career in loan brokerage. The field is dangerous, especially when you can't trust the other players.

programme.title: Best Friend
programme.desc: Dae-kwon is a NIS agent specializing in wiretapping. On the verge of demotion, he receives an order from Mr. Kim, his senior: surveilling a well-known politician and his family in house arrest. That politician, Lee Eui-min, is the opposition party's frontrunner for the next presidency. Disguising as next-door neighbors, Dae-kwon and his team must find evidence to stop him from running.

programme.title: Monster
programme.desc: Bok-Soon tries to take revenge on her sister’s killer, Tae-Soo, while he also tries to silence her for good.

programme.title: Asurado
programme.desc: A string-wielding prisoner brings order to a violent prison—until his old enemy becomes the new warden.
